persons: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Wimbledon players will be able to revive a lost tradition when the queen visits the tournament for the first time in 33 years. The All England Club dropped the tradition of a bow or curtsy to the royal box in 2003.
snippet: Wimbledon players will be able to revive a lost tradition when the queen visits the tournament for the first time in 33 years. The All England Club dropped the tradition of a bow or curtsy to the royal box in 2003.
